newsitem.title: CHINA: Hua Nan Com Bank mandates US$100 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Hua Nan Com Bank mandates US$100 mln FRN.

text.p: Hua Nan Commercial Bank has mandated two banks to arrange a US$100 million floating rate notes issue, bankers said on Tuesday.
The issue, which will be launched through the bank's offshore banking branch, has a final maturity of five years with a call option on the third anniversary.
With fees, the all-in return is expected to be in the early 20s.
The mandated arrangers are Tokyo-Mitsubishi International (HK) and Bayerische Landesbank.
Hua Nan Commercial Bank, one of the "big three" Taiwanese banks, is rated A2 by Moody's Investors Service.
It is the first offshore debt issue by the bank.
